title: Is a B.Ed. compulsory after a master of arts? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes, definitely compulsory and essential! Whereas a master degree gives you mastery or command over your subject, it can not be compared with a B.Ed degree which is a professional degree dedicated for bringing out a teacher in you. B.Ed degree provides you teaching skills and ability to deal with the psychology of learners. Also, as per NCTE guidelines, B.Ed degree is mandatory to enter into teaching field if you are aiming for secondary school teaching.

If you are opting a career in teaching then the answer is yes. Today teaching job needs B. Ed. as a mandatory qualification. If you are preparing for other competitive examination such as banking , SSC then it is not compulsory. At last choice is yours.
